localize.title: 为什么他们还在制造汽车报警器？

previous.excerpt:
Someone please explain to me what citadel is trying to do, retail only makes up
10% of daily float why would they care about stopping retail from buying.
Something is not adding up, I was wondering about why citadel bought melvin a
few days ago, I know everyone thinks they figured it out but I think…
previous.title: What is Citadel's plan

localize.title: Citadel的计划是什么？

几天前，我知道每个人都认为他们想通了，但我认为... ...

localize.title: Citadel的計劃是什麼？
